# MNLCor

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of MNLCor is to estimate the nonlinear correlation between taxon and 
metadata or taxon and taxon.

## Installation

You can install the released version of MNLCor from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("MNLCor")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rusher321/MNLCor")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(MNLCor)
## basic example code
```


You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo = FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```
